snippet: Denis O’Brien and his cellphone company, Digicel, are leading a business-centered approach to the redevelopment of a disaster-prone nation.
abstract: Denis O’Brien and his cellphone company, Digicel, are leading a business-centered approach to the redevelopment of Haiti; firm is country's largest employer and taxpayer, and has invested $600 million in Haiti, democratizing communications with its strategy of selling low-price cellphones and services to the masses.
lead_paragraph: Denis O’Brien and his cellphone company, Digicel, are leading a business-centered approach to the redevelopment of a disaster-prone nation.

headline.seo: Digicel’s Denis O’Brien Helps Rebuild Haiti
headline.main: A Billionaire Lends Haiti a Hand
headline.print_headline: A Billionaire Lends Haiti a Hand
